titles: Some reflections on a pamphlet intituled, England and East-India inconsistent in their manufactures
author: Davenant, Charles, 1656-1714.
Gardner.
notes: Attributed to Charles Davenant by NUC pre-1956. Also attributed to a writer named Gardner. Cf. BM; Halkett & Laing; Wing.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
keywords: Pollexfen, John, b. ca. 1638. --  England and East India inconsistent in their manufactures.
